name: Glaze
description:
This simulation incorporates an exclusion process - if something tries to enter a cell that is already above a certain threshold density, then it's velocity is set to zero instead. The result is something that behaves as a liquid at low densities and speeds, but jams into a solid around a particular threshold. Here, combined with weak gravity, that results in islands of frozen material and a sort of cracked glaze texture. / @ngutten

2560 x 1440 mp4
